author: Simon Difford
description: Takes some getting through the fine strainer, but when you do it's simply strawberries and cream with the faintest hint of alcohol. Wimbledon is all about strawberries & cream.
name: Wimbledon Martini
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
